alert.note: Alert for Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 6:34PM CDT until May 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL VAL VERDE COUNTY... At 633 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Seminole Canyon State Park to 6 miles southeast of Comstock to near Del Rio, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 6:21, a 62 mph wind gust was measured near Lake View. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Del Rio, Comstock, Lake View, Amistad Acres, Shumla, Amistad Village, Black Brush Point, Seminole Canyon State Park, Box Canyon, Diablo East, Governors Landing, Long Point, Cienegas Terrace, Pecos River Boat Ramp, 277 South Boat Ramp, 277 North Campground, Rough Canyon Recreation Area, Spur 406 Campground, Rock Quarry Campground and Salem Point. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
